name: Raiden III Digital Edition

files.game: N/A:Please select the Windows installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the Windows installer provided by GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Raiden III/Raiden3.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
gogid: raiden_3_digital_edition
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: winemenubuilder.exe
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
- task:
    app: d3dx9_36
    description: Installing d3dx9_36 dll
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: false
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing Raiden III
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
